title: Replace app logo image with a 3D education globe PNG and adjust the selected div sizing

requirements.text: Replace the currently displayed logo image (the selected element at XPath /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div[1]/img[1]) with a new PNG logo based on the referenced Freepik design, and ensure the new PNG is the one rendered by the app wherever that selected logo image is shown.

acceptanceCriteria: A PNG logo asset is added to the frontend static assets and is used as the rendered logo for the selected logo element.
The logo displayed in the UI is visually updated to the new 3D education globe + graduation cap style (not the previous logo).
The logo renders correctly without broken-image errors in the browser console.

requirements.text: Adjust styling of the selected container element at XPath /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/section[1]/div[1] so that its rendered size appears slightly larger than the YouTube player element on the same screen (i.e., increase the container’s visual prominence by increasing its effective width/height and/or padding/margins while keeping layout stable).

acceptanceCriteria: Only the selected div (XPath /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/section[1]/div[1]) is resized/retuned; unrelated page elements remain unchanged.
After the change, the selected div is visually slightly larger than the embedded YouTube player area when viewed at typical mobile and desktop widths.
No layout overflow or horizontal scrolling is introduced by the size adjustment.

constraints: Apply changes ONLY to the two user-selected elements identified by the provided XPaths.
Do not edit any files under frontend/src/components/ui (read-only).
Keep the existing React + TypeScript + Tailwind stack; do not introduce new backend services or databases.
nonGoals: Do not redesign other parts of the app theme, layout, routing, or content beyond the two selected elements.
Do not add new features beyond updating the selected image and resizing the selected div.

required: 3D illustration of a globe with a graduation cap, education-themed, clean PNG with transparent background (app-logo.dim_512x512.png)

preferencesToAdd: Use the new education-themed 3D globe + graduation cap PNG as the app logo image.
